# cloudautomator_job (Data Source)

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "cloudautomator_job" "example-job" {
  id = 123
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

- `id` (String) ジョブID

- `trace_status` (String)


<a id="nestedatt--start_workspaces_action_value"></a>
### Nested Schema for `start_workspaces_action_value`

Read-Only:

- `region` (String)
- `tag_key` (String)
- `tag_value` (String)

- `trace_status` (String)
